column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: On the morning of 28 November 2018 a Frenchman was brought to the police station in BKK 2
column5: the undocumented foreigner was ALEXIS PAUL JEAN VUILLOT
column10: Phnom Penh.------Police  took him to the immigration office
column11: where he admitted that he arrived in Cambodia on the 15th. July 2016 at Phnom Penh International Airport.------He told officials that he had statyed at the address on Street 288
column13: with his girlfriend. He has been without work and a valid visa for some time.------The Frenchman is currently detained at the General Department of Immigration.------https://www.amapapa.news/2018/11/blog-post_573.html
